channel.title: Dark Shift: Mod Idea
channel.description:
I was thinking of posting this before I actually did anything. I decided to cancel my other mod as it was going no-where whatsoever.
Dark Shift is playing as Barney in Half Life 2. Going through being a Combine, and keeping up with your "beating quota".
Also, it goes through events where you were separated from Gordon, which was a lot, such as fighting in the streets of City 17.
Although this is just a plain blank idea, does anyone think it's worth going forward with?

item.title: Dark Shift: Mod Idea
item.dc:creator: Spycrabz
item.description:
SoaringScout:

UB3R L33T P0L!C3 M0D F0R B!4CK M3$4

Typing like that is time consuming.

Then don’t.

gugamilare:

BTW, that parrot from λdam’s avatar MUST be shown somewhere (television, animated poster, anywhere), it is too cool to stay out of it

If I get a job as a Mapper for Dark Shift/Brown Shift/Chain Reaction (I like that one), I’ll think of you

Read full topic

item.title: Dark Shift: Mod Idea
item.dc:creator: gugamilare
item.description:
Spycrabz:

Brown Shift?

jk.

Yeah… With some flies around the title

Spycrabz:

Counter Attack sound too much like Counter Strike, and it’s not Sciency enough.

What about “The Reaction”? Or “Barney’s Reaction”? Or maybe “Chain Reaction”, regarding the chain of reactions triggered by the Nova Prospect invasion?

BTW, that parrot from λdam’s avatar MUST be shown somewhere (television, animated poster, anywhere), it is too cool to stay out of it

Read full topic

item.title: Dark Shift: Mod Idea
item.dc:creator: Apollomasque
item.description:
Bluemen230:

Since when were Episode One and Episode 2 scientific phenomenas or physical states?

Scientist One: We have just discovered how to time travel! We shall call this process Time Warp!
Scientist Two: Sounds laaaame, how 'bout we just call it Episode Two?
Scientist One: I don’t know, it doesn’t really have a ring to it…

They were both still had Half Life 2 in the title, therefore Half Life, therefore you suck.

Read full topic

item.description:
Thanks for saying that, I was just about to Comment about you probably giving up, lol

Btw, Action Potential sounds good. Though, Natural Selection is already a no since that’s another mod’s name.

Read full topic

item.title: Dark Shift: Mod Idea
item.dc:creator: _amp_955_dam
item.description:
This is definitely still alive, just on a short hold until I get my new computer.

As some of you know, I am trying to do that Black Mesa machinima, and I’d love to have that finished around the same time as BM’s release. So I am doing the voicing, intro’s, etc.

I still want this to go on, It’s not cancelled.

Unless, if someone else wants to go on with it for a short while, and I can catch up? That’s just an idea, if anyone really wants to do that.

Read full topic

item.title: Dark Shift: Mod Idea
item.dc:creator: Zelfase
item.description:
For a name, how about Action Potential, Adaptation, or hell, Natural Selection even? They’re all scientific terms, and I think they relate to Barney’s story.
Also I’m good at testing video games. When my friend was trying to make maps and crap for mods, he’d always come to me to test it out.

Read full topic

item.title: Dark Shift: Mod Idea
item.dc:creator: Apollomasque
item.description:
The name has to be a scientific phenomena or physical state. Here are some names and plots.
Absolute Zero: A rebel attempts to reach The Borealis in the arctic to rendezvous with Gordon.
Doppler Effect: a teleportation experiment goes awry, creating a clone of one of the characters. Hijinks ensue
Fouling: Again, a rebel attempts to shut down a Combine plant that is pouring pollution into the oceans.

All I’m saying, Dark shift doesn’t follow the trend.

Read full topic

item.title: Dark Shift: Mod Idea
item.dc:creator: morg1985
item.description:
I like this idea. It would be cool to start a little while before you take controle of Freeman in HL2 to see how you infiltrated Civil Protection.then youd meet up with Gordon and play through the opening bit of HL2. After that your off doing your own thing. Youd need a few time gaps to play through all of Barneys appearances so far but it still sounds like a cool mod. il try and help out with story ideas if it takes off.

Read full topic

item.title: Dark Shift: Mod Idea
item.dc:creator: MtzBraves
item.description:
I LOVE the idea. I have a suggestion though…I think that you should make it a short little mini game first. You would be Calhoun running around with a stun stick talking like a combine. Or you could make it one big room and with windows and have people swarming in (the HL2 models) and all you can do is stun stick them before your health runs out. You could also have rounds (Yes, this is a lot like call of duty 5 zombies). I think you should do something like that first. Just so you know you can ACTUALLY make a game, and have it running, AND be able to distribute it, before starting a big project like you guys are coming up with. I can help with story, and design.

Read full topic
